languages.text: "Если эти символы угроза тебе, элантах — найди и искорени ее. Если знаки почтения — прими такими, какие они есть".
"If these symbols mean a threat to you, elantach, then find the threat and end it. If they are signs of respect, then accept them as they are."
languages.original_text: "Если эти символы угроза тебе, элантах — найди и искорени ее. Если знаки почтения — прими такими, какие они есть".

traits.locale_text: "If these symbols mean a threat to you, elantach, then find the threat and end it. If they are signs of respect, then accept them as they are."
"If these symbols mean a threat to you, elantach, then find the threat and end it. If they are signs of respect, then accept them as they are."
"If these symbols mean a threat to you, elantach, then find the threat and end it. If they are signs of respect, then accept them as they are."
"If these symbols mean a threat to you, elantach, then find the threat and end it. If they are signs of respect, then accept them as they are."
"If these symbols mean a threat to you, elantach, then find the threat and end it. If they are signs of respect, then accept them as they are."
"If these symbols mean a threat to you, elantach, then find the threat and end it. If they are signs of respect, then accept them as they are."

languages.text: « Si ces symboles signifient qu'une menace plane sur vous, elantach, alors il vous suffit de trouver cette menace et de l'éliminer. Si en revanche ce sont des gages de respect, acceptez-les comme tels. »
languages.original_text: "If these symbols mean a threat to you, elantach, then find the threat and end it. If they are signs of respect, then accept them as they are."

traits.locale_text: « Si ces symboles signifient qu'une menace plane sur vous, elantach, alors il vous suffit de trouver cette menace et de l'éliminer. Si en revanche ce sont des gages de respect, acceptez-les comme tels. »

languages.text: «Elantach, si estos símbolos son una amenaza, encuentra la amenaza y elimínala. Si son muestras de respeto, acéptalas por lo que son».
languages.original_text: "If these symbols mean a threat to you, elantach, then find the threat and end it. If they are signs of respect, then accept them as they are."

traits.locale_text: «Elantach, si estos símbolos son una amenaza, encuentra la amenaza y elimínala. Si son muestras de respeto, acéptalas por lo que son».

languages.text: 「このシンボルがあなたにとって恐ろしいものなら、その恐怖を見つけ出して終わらせるのだ。尊敬の印に見えるなら、そのまま受け入れるといい」
languages.original_text: "If these symbols mean a threat to you, elantach, then find the threat and end it. If they are signs of respect, then accept them as they are."

traits.locale_text: 「このシンボルがあなたにとって恐ろしいものなら、その恐怖を見つけ出して終わらせるのだ。尊敬の印に見えるなら、そのまま受け入れるといい」

languages.text: “如果这些符号对你意味着威胁，外界人，那就找到那个威胁，消灭它。如果这些符号意味着尊重，那就接受它们原本的面目。”
languages.original_text: "If these symbols mean a threat to you, elantach, then find the threat and end it. If they are signs of respect, then accept them as they are."

traits.locale_text: “如果这些符号对你意味着威胁，外界人，那就找到那个威胁，消灭它。如果这些符号意味着尊重，那就接受它们原本的面目。”

languages.text: "Falls diese Symbole eine Bedrohung für Euch sind, Elantach, dann findet die Bedrohung und vernichtet sie. Falls es Zeichen des Respekts sind, dann akzeptiert sie als solche."
languages.original_text: "If these symbols mean a threat to you, elantach, then find the threat and end it. If they are signs of respect, then accept them as they are."

traits.locale_text: "Falls diese Symbole eine Bedrohung für Euch sind, Elantach, dann findet die Bedrohung und vernichtet sie. Falls es Zeichen des Respekts sind, dann akzeptiert sie als solche."

languages.text: "Elantach, bu sembolleri bir tehdit olarak görüyorsan bu tehdidin köküne inip onu yok etmelisin. Şayet hürmet belirtiyorlarsa oldukları gibi kabullenmelisin."
languages.original_text: "If these symbols mean a threat to you, elantach, then find the threat and end it. If they are signs of respect, then accept them as they are."
